sentence.text: @SirJadeja overs 21.4 wickets 6 great job jaddu sir #INDvsAUS @akshaykumar congratulations Rostum sir for winning national award @lynny50 wishing you an advance happy birthday and keep rocking in IPL #KKR #IPL2017 @superstarrajini sir ur very anger in video of sathyaraj making comments on kannadigas.

#Bahubali release in karnataka #Kannadiga What about you @sardesairajdeep sir https://t.co/H8oECRD5bh Great innings by RCB every batsman scored single digit run, no sixes keepit up and motivate other teams.
#RCBvKKR @ssrajamouli sir #Bahubali2 its unbelievable movie i felt i was the part of mahishmathi Kingdom.
@SirJadeja sir any reson u following #SirIshantSharma only.
